description: We are seeking an experienced Senior Software Developer to join our growing team. You will be responsible for developing scalable web applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and mentoring junior developers. This role offers the opportunity to work on innovative projects using modern technologies while contributing to our company's digital transformation initiatives.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, 5+ years of experience in full-stack development, proficiency in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and SQL databases, experience with cloud platforms (AWS/Azure), strong problem-solving skills, excellent communication skills in Dutch and English, experience with Agile methodologies preferred.
